author: derektalon
text: Happy Juneteenth everybody! Today we celebrate the full and final abolition of slavery in The US. In 1865, Almost two years after #theemancipationproclamation the federal orders to #freeall enslaved people was announced in Galveston, Texas on this day. #BLM

author: derektalon
text:
“In a fallen world, beauty is a form of protest. A way to push back the darkness.” @ianmorgancron Chasing Francis. 

This book is so profoundly affecting my life and giving me language for thoughts I’ve had for quite some time. Thank you @ianmorgancron

author: derektalon
text: “There’s a difference between art that trusts beauty’s simple power to point people to God, and Christian art that’s consciously propagandistic”. @ianmorgancron Chasing Francis

author: derektalon
text: “Every person is created in God’s image. Regardless of anyone’s age, sex, race, whether they’re in submission to God or not, experience same-sex attraction or identify as gay or lesbian, everyone is created in the imago Dei. It’s inherent to who we are and is never erased.”
